meaningMnemonic: You know how 乱れる is "to be in disorder"? Well, now you're the one causing this. So, by doing this you are going <vocabulary>to put in disorder</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>to throw out of order</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>to disturb</vocabulary> whatever it is. Just imagine all the people who will try to <reading>sue</reading> (す) you for your actions.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the same as 乱れる, so hopefully you know it already.
